image.insertImage: INSERT INTO IMAGE ( IMAGE_ID , PLACE_ID , IMAGE_NAME , IMAGE_LOCATION ) VALUES ( IMAGE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )

member.addNewMember: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( EMAIL , PASSWORD , NAME ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ? )
member.getMemberByIdAndPassword: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = ? AND PASSWORD = ?

place.placeInfoRecommendedList: SELECT P.PLACE_ID , PLACE_NAME , IMAGE_ID FROM PLACE P , MEMBER M , IMAGE I WHERE M.EMAIL = P.EMAIL AND P.PLACE_ID = I.PLACE_ID
place.insertPlaceInfo: INSERT INTO PLACE ( PLACE_ID , PLACE_NAME , ADDRESS , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , DESCRIPTION , EMAIL ) VALUES ( PLACE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
